thread.title: Kylie Jenner's New Haircut Steals the Alexander Wang's Fall 2017 Front Row
thread.title_full: Kylie Jenner's New Haircut Steals the Alexander Wang's Fall 2017 Front Row

title: Kylie Jenner's New Haircut Steals the Alexander Wang's Fall 2017 Front Row

organizations.name: dramatic new cut steals the alexander wang front row

text: Kylie Jenner’s Dramatic New Cut Steals the Alexander Wang Front Row February 12, 2017 2:40 AM by Calin Van Paris Photo: Getty Images The most head-turning member of Alexander Wang’s ever-growing girl squad tonight? Kylie Jenner , who stepped out with a dramatic new shag. Wang’s front row has been known to breed a subversive of-the- moment beauty , and Jenner made the most of the occasion for the designer’s show in Harlem, trading her usual extensions and sleek, chest-skimming styles for a striking shoulder-length chop and brow-sweeping micro bangs. Arriving less than 48 hours after her sister Kendall debuted her own abbreviated cut on the La Perla runway , Kylie put her unique stamp on the bob with choppy, tough-chic layers and a glossy, damp finish. It was a move that reimagined the youngest member of the Jenner clan as a modern-day Joan Jett, and couldn’t have been further from the extreme platinum lengths that the social media star debuted last season at the designer’s show . Call it the first breakout front-row transformation of New York Fashion Week —and a compelling new reason to consider crossing over to the dark side of hair color this season.
